name: PocketMonsters-Alpha
author: joey
description:
Category: Alphas
Purpose: Pixel Art with Tranparency / Alpha Channel

upscaling pixel art with alpha channels that should perform better than any other. It should work well on both cartoon and 3D styled content.
dataset: Pokemon drawings, vector art, and Pokemon Home 3D render sprites, downscaled to 256x256 for HR and downscaled with nearest neighbor for LR.
